So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take. The dynamics of what even Google calls its management`` triumvirate'' are somewhat murky, but the co-founders appear to worry more about idealism, while Eric Schmidt has advocated increased commercialization. Google policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, Eric Schmidt once said. Debate about the location of that line is most likely when it comes to markets like China and activities like using users' data for profit. So far, the company seems to

`` can't wait'' to go on tour, explaining the show is a`` roller-coaster journey'' of dance styles and performances. On Britain's Got Talent in 2009, Simon Cowell described their routine as one of the best things I have ever seen in my life . After their success in the TV talent show, Flawless have gone on to star in the movie StreetDance 3D, as well as appearing in music videos for Madonna, Beyonce, Leona Lewis and Westlife.

guard Allen Iverson signed a two-year contract with Turkish club Besiktas on Friday. Allen Iverson played 25 games with the Philadelphia 76ers last season averaging 13.9 points but was unable to secure an offer from an NBA team this season. I'm at the point in my career where mentally and physically I know I can play basketball and that's what I want to do. If I can't play in the NBA, but I want to play basketball, that's a decision I have to make, Allen Iverson told reporters in New York.`` My whole thing was being wanted and being accepted by a ball club. That was the most important thing to me: to be wanted.'' The deal is set
